tap."},{"lineNumber":88672,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":88673,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こわっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Scary...\""},{"lineNumber":88674,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ど、どうしましょう、ランス様……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-What should we do, Lord Lance...?\""},{"lineNumber":88675,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーむ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":88676,"originalJapaneseLine":"「より強く殴るか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Shall I hit him harder?\""},{"lineNumber":88677,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、それは……せめて最後の手段で……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-That should be a last resort...\""},{"lineNumber":88678,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんか適当にもの食わすか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"How about feeding him something random?"},{"lineNumber":88679,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どれか当たりを引けば治る気がする」","translatedEnglishLine":"If we get the right one, he might get better.\""},{"lineNumber":88680,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、悪くない手だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, not a bad idea."},{"lineNumber":88681,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それで治るのはピグらしい」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's typical of Pig that it would be cured that if he eats something bad,"},{"lineNumber":88684,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今はおしとやかで済んでいるが、","translatedEnglishLine":"he's being gentle now, but"},{"lineNumber":88685,"originalJapaneseLine":"　頭が良くなったり悪い子になったりしそうだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"he might become either smarter or a bad true...\""},{"lineNumber":88688,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが試してみなければ始まるまい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But if we don’t try, nothing will away.\""},{"lineNumber":88690,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はい、分かりました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-Yes, understood.\""},{"lineNumber":88691,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス、ランスー♪","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lance, Lance~♪"},{"lineNumber":88692,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちゅっちゅっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Chu-chu (smooch smooch)\""},{"lineNumber":88693,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えーい、ピグ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, Pig."},{"lineNumber":88694,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今は大事な話をしてるんだから後で……」","translatedEnglishLine":"We're having an important conversation right now, so later...\""},{"lineNumber":88695,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":88696,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大事な話って、なーにー？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"An important conversation? What is it?\""},{"lineNumber":88697,"originalJapaneseLine":"ピグが呑気にランスの頬に","translatedEnglishLine":"Pig nonchalantly kissed Lance's cheek."},{"lineNumber":88698,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちゅっちゅっとキスをしてきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"He gave him a little smooch."},{"lineNumber":88699,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":88700,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおっ、治ってる！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa, he's healed!?\""},{"lineNumber":88701,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はぁ〜〜っ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haahhh...\""},{"lineNumber":88702,"originalJapaneseLine":"　も、戻りましたね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"He’s back to normal...\""},{"lineNumber":88703,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、ずっとこのままかと、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, I thought he’d stay like this forever,"},{"lineNumber":88704,"originalJapaneseLine":"　少し心配したが治ったなら良かった」","translatedEnglishLine":"I was a bit worried, but I’m glad he’s better.\""},{"lineNumber":88705,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、なんだったんだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But, what was that...\""},{"lineNumber":88706,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ピグ……謎の多い奴……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Pig... such a mysterious guy...\""},{"lineNumber":88707,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？　どうかしたー？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm? What’s up?\""},{"lineNumber":88708,"originalJapaneseLine":"ピグはニコニコと楽しそうにしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Pig was smiling happily."},{"lineNumber":88709,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":88710,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、いいや。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, whatever."},{"lineNumber":88711,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それよりなんか腹減ってきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"More importantly, I’m getting hungry."},{"lineNumber":88712,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おやつはあるか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Do we have any snacks?\""},{"lineNumber":88713,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、はい、焼き芋がありますよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, yes, we have roasted sweet potatoes."},{"lineNumber":88714,"originalJapaneseLine":"　用意しますね」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ll prepare them now.\""},{"lineNumber":88715,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さて、私も家事に戻るかな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, I guess I’ll get back to the housework.\""},{"lineNumber":88716,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃねー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"See ya.\""},{"lineNumber":88717,"originalJapaneseLine":"　わーい、焼き芋、焼き芋」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yay, roasted sweet potatoes, roasted sweet potatoes!\""},{"lineNumber":88718,"originalJapaneseLine":"「バターたっぷりだぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lots of butter."},{"lineNumber":88719,"originalJapaneseLine":"　牛乳もちゃんと用意しろよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Make sure to have some milk ready too.\""},{"lineNumber":88720,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はーい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Okay!\""},{"lineNumber":88721,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わーい♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yay!♪\""},{"lineNumber":88722,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城のある日の一幕だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was a moment in Lance Castle one day."},{"lineNumber":88723,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦争が始まってからの常だが――","translatedEnglishLine":"As usual since the war began—"},{"lineNumber":88724,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヘルマンの軍議室は重い空気に包まれていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hermann's war council room was shrouded in heavy atmosphere."},{"lineNumber":88725,"originalJapaneseLine":"「以上が現在の兵数の報告となります」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That is the current report on troop numbers.\""},{"lineNumber":88726,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……はい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yes.\""},{"lineNumber":88727,"originalJapaneseLine":"「また、今日も犠牲が出ましたね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Once again, there were casualties today...\""},{"lineNumber":88728,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes."},{"lineNumber":88729,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こればかりは仕方ありません」","translatedEnglishLine":"There's nothing we can do about that.\""},{"lineNumber":88730,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チョンとピグがランスの鼻をつついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pig poked Lance's nose with a tap.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ど、どうしましょう、ランス様……」
「そ、それは……せめて最後の手段で……」
「なんか適当にもの食わすか？
どれか当たりを引けば治る気がする」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we get the right one, he might get better."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それで治るのはピグらしい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's typical of Pig that it would be cured that way."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今はおしとやかで済んでいるが、
頭が良くなったり悪い子になったりしそうだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he might become either smarter or a bad child."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが試してみなければ始まるまい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But if we don’t try, nothing will start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル、適当な食い物どかちゃか持ってこい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sil, bring some random food right away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は大事な話をしてるんだから後で……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're having an important conversation right now, so later..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピグが呑気にランスの頬に
ちゅっちゅっとキスをしてきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He gave him a little smooch.
"Hmm, I thought he’d stay like this forever,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し心配したが治ったなら良かった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was a bit worried, but I’m glad he’s better."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピグはニコニコと楽しそうにしていた。
それよりなんか腹減ってきた。
「あ、はい、焼き芋がありますよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, yes, we have roasted sweet potatoes.
"Well then, I guess I’ll get back to the housework."
"Yay, roasted sweet potatoes, roasted sweet potatoes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 牛乳もちゃんと用意しろよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make sure to have some milk ready too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城のある日の一幕だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a moment in Lance Castle one day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争が始まってからの常だが――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As usual since the war began—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンの軍議室は重い空気に包まれていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hermann's war council room was shrouded in heavy atmosphere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「以上が現在の兵数の報告となります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That is the current report on troop numbers."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「また、今日も犠牲が出ましたね……」
こればかりは仕方ありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's nothing we can do about that."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チョンとピグがランスの鼻をつついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pig poked Lance's nose with a tap.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ど、どうしましょう、ランス様……」
「そ、それは……せめて最後の手段で……」
「なんか適当にもの食わすか？
どれか当たりを引けば治る気がする」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we get the right one, he might get better."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それで治るのはピグらしい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's typical of Pig that it would be cured that way."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今はおしとやかで済んでいるが、
頭が良くなったり悪い子になったりしそうだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he might become either smarter or a bad child."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが試してみなければ始まるまい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But if we don’t try, nothing will start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル、適当な食い物どかちゃか持ってこい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sil, bring some random food right away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は大事な話をしてるんだから後で……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're having an important conversation right now, so later..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピグが呑気にランスの頬に
ちゅっちゅっとキスをしてきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He gave him a little smooch.
"Hmm, I thought he’d stay like this forever,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し心配したが治ったなら良かった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was a bit worried, but I’m glad he’s better."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピグはニコニコと楽しそうにしていた。
それよりなんか腹減ってきた。
「あ、はい、焼き芋がありますよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, yes, we have roasted sweet potatoes.
"Well then, I guess I’ll get back to the housework."
"Yay, roasted sweet potatoes, roasted sweet potatoes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 牛乳もちゃんと用意しろよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make sure to have some milk ready too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城のある日の一幕だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a moment in Lance Castle one day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争が始まってからの常だが――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As usual since the war began—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンの軍議室は重い空気に包まれていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hermann's war council room was shrouded in heavy atmosphere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「以上が現在の兵数の報告となります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That is the current report on troop numbers."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「また、今日も犠牲が出ましたね……」
こればかりは仕方ありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's nothing we can do about that."
